string-array.name: tut_history
string-array.item: To revert to a previous step,
touch the step and hold.

string-array.name: tut_hitsolve
string-array.item: Tap Solve to start manipulating your equation.

string-array.name: tut_powerdrag
string-array.item: To take the root of both sides,
drag an exponent to the other side.

string-array.name: tut_power
string-array.item: To raise a term to its exponent,
double tap the exponent.

string-array.name: tut_rootdrag
string-array.item: To square both sides,
drag a square root sign to the other side.

string-array.name: tut_root
string-array.item: Double tap a square root sign
to square root its contents.

resources.string: Hit the back button to enter another equation.

string-array.name: tut_solvemessage_2
string-array.item: To move terms around,
simply drag and drop them.

string-array.name: tut_solvemessage_3
string-array.item: Use the + button at the bottom of the screen
to add a new term to both sides.

string-array.name: tut_solvemessage_4
string-array.item: The other symbols at the bottom of the screen will
perform their respective operations to both sides.

string-array.name: tut_solvemessage_5
string-array.item: To add, subtract, multiply or divide two terms,
double tap the +, -, × or ÷ symbol separating them.

resources.string: Go ahead and type an equation.
You can tap on these messages to skip them.
Type in what you want to add to both sides.
Type in what you want to subtract from both sides.
Type in what you want to multiply both sides by.
Type in what you want to divide both sides by.
Type in what power you want to raise both sides to.
Raise Both Sides to a Power

string-array.name: tut_both_2
string-array.item: Then, tap Ok to accept your changes
and bring them back to the Solve Screen.

string-array.name: tut_both_3
string-array.item: Or, tap Cancel or the back button to reject your changes
and go back to the Solve Screen.
